Subject: Invitation to discuss world‑building on Future Frontiers

Dear N. K. Jemisin,

I hope you’re doing well! My name is Alex Rivera, host of the "Future Frontiers" podcast, where we explore the cutting edge of speculative storytelling and the creative processes behind it. 

Our upcoming episode, "Building Immersive Worlds: Techniques and Secrets," is dedicated to unpacking the art and science of world‑building in science‑fiction. Given your masterful creation of the Broken Earth universe—renowned for its depth, cultural richness, and innovative ecological themes—I believe you would be an extraordinary guest to discuss how you craft such compelling worlds.

We record remotely at a time that suits you and aim for a relaxed, conversational format lasting about 45 minutes. It would be an honor to share your insights with our audience of writers, creators, and enthusiastic readers.

Would you be interested in joining us? I’m happy to work around your schedule and provide any additional details you need.

Thank you for considering the invitation. I look forward to the possibility of speaking with you!

Warm regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Future Frontiers
alex@futurefrontierspod.com

✅ **Guest Selected:** N. K. Jemisin
